title: Alaska, The Fastest Warming State
description: Demonstrates the change in average temperture of month throughout Alaska and States in the U.S. to show how quickly Alaska is warming up.(https://maayahga.github.io/DSC106_Project_3/)

title: Boston Biking Monitor
description: Interactive visualization that shows the density of bikes in Boston and which Bike stops are most busy at what tiems.(https://maayahga.github.io/bikewatching/)

title: Democratic States Have had a Larger Growth Rate in Abortions
description: Percent rate of change of abortion rate between red and blue states.

title: Red states have had larger growth in abortion clinics
description: Percent growth ao the amount of Abortion Clinics has grown more in Red states than Blue states.

title: Which Grogery Store Has the best Priced Protein-Dense Brands
description: This is a scatter plot that shows the amount of protein-dense brands each major grocery store holds.

title: NBA Teams Miles Traveled Per Year
description: This is a vizualization that demonstrates how miles travled through NBA teams has changed through the years.

title: NBA Teams Total Times Traveled
description: Demonstrates the amount of times teams had to travel to their games.

title: NBA Teams Schedule Impacted Wins
description: This graph shows which teams and how many wins or losses they had were impacted due to schedule reasons.

title: Task Management System
description: A collaborative task management tool with real-time updates using WebSockets and Node.js.
